articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Small number of iOS, Android users are testing out a new look for the Google Photos app - PhoneArena
articles.description: Google is testing out a UI change for the Google Photos app that has rolled out to a small number of iOS and Android users.

articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: A Google Workspace update makes alt text easier to add - The Verge
articles.description: Google is moving the alt text field to the Image options sidebar, making it much easier to find the accessibility feature that allows screen readers to describe an image for people who have trouble seeing onscreen images.
